description: Forget expensive coffee shop lattes, here's how to make an Oat Milk Matcha Latte at home! You don't need any fancy equipment, just matcha, something to sweeten it with, and oat milk or the milk of your choice.
keywords: dairy free matcha latte, oat milk matcha latte
name: Oat Milk Matcha Latte
recipeIngredient: 1 cup oat milk (or milk of choice)
1/4 cup hot water (boiled and cooled slightly)

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the water in a kettle, and after it boils allow the kettle to sit for a full five minutes before using the water.
Heat the oat milk to very warm (not boiling) in the microwave or stove top.
Add 1/2 - 1 teaspoon matcha powder to the bottom of a mug. Add 1/4 cup hot water, and whisk until smooth using a bamboo whisk or other device (see notes in post).
Add the honey, and whisk again. Add the hot oat milk and stir to combine well.
